title: 110_s2296
content: Mortgage Disclosure Enhancement Act of 2007 - Amends the Truth In Lending Act to require additional mortgage loan disclosures by a creditor to a consumer, including: (1) ) the percentage of the loan, as compared to the appraised value of the property, (2) the term of the loan. (3) the monthly income of the borrower, as relied upon in making the loan. (4) the annual percentage rate of interest for loans that are fixed, and for loans that are variable, (5) prepayment fees. And (6) balloon payments. Amends the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 to conform with this Act.
